scripts.test: npm run test:rspack && npm run test:webpack
scripts.test:rspack: cross-env USE_RSPACK=true TARGET=prod playwright test && cross-env USE_RSPACK=true TARGET=dev playwright test
scripts.test:webpack: cross-env USE_RSPACK=false TARGET=prod playwright test && cross-env USE_RSPACK=false TARGET=dev playwright test
scripts.test:ui:rspack: cross-env USE_RSPACK=true TARGET=dev pnpm run test:ui
scripts.test:ui:webpack: cross-env USE_RSPACK=false TARGET=dev pnpm run test:ui
